title: Webpack 5 throws "Target module of reexport from '...' is not part of the concatenation"
body:
<!-- Please don't delete this template because we'll close your issue -->
<!-- Before creating an issue please make sure you are using the latest version of webpack. -->

# Bug report

Working on the migration of https://github.com/Automattic/wp-calypso to Webpack 5 I found an error that I can't figure out:

```
ERROR in ./node_modules/@wordpress/element/build-module/index.js + 1 modules
Target module of reexport from './node_modules/@wordpress/element/build-module/index.js' is not part of the concatenation
```

I tried to do a minimal reproduction case in https://github.com/scinos/webpack5-concat-reexport-error/, but unfortunately is not as minimal as I'd like :( I know having a reproduction case that depends on external npm dependencies is far from ideal, but I wasn't able to simplify it further.

What I know:
- Removing the `alias` in wepback config fixes the problem. Important: when resolved by Webpack, `@wordpress/data` is loaded from `node_modules/@wordpress/data/build-module`, aliasing it to `node_modules/@wordpress/data/build` shows the problem. AFAIK the only difference is `build-module` uses ESM and `build` uses CJS.

- It hits https://github.com/webpack/webpack/blob/master/lib/optimize/ConcatenatedModule.js#L413, trying to find the export for `Children` (which I believe it is reexported by https://github.com/WordPress/gutenberg/blob/master/packages/element/src/index.js#L2).




**What is the current behavior?**

Webpack throws
```
ERROR in ./node_modules/@wordpress/element/build-module/index.js + 1 modules
Target module of reexport from './node_modules/@wordpress/element/build-module/index.js' is not part of the concatenation
```

**If the current behavior is a bug, please provide the steps to reproduce.**
1. Checkout the reproduction repo
2. Run `yarn`
3. Run `yarn webpack`

**What is the expected behavior?**

Webpack compiles the project without errors

**Other relevant information:**
webpack version:  5.8.0
Node.js version: 12.18.4
Operating System: macOS 10.15.7
